Articles.Content:
Kerbal is about to explode. Save as many lives as you can by sending them to the mun.

Rules

Released mods are OK but anything that carries kerbals must be stock!

No cheats or debug!

One launch only, you haven't time to do multiple launches!

Most kerbals alive on the mun wins!

Post your launch and landed craft with your kerbals.

Use Crew Manifest for easy loading of your craft

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/18-1-kerbal-crew-manifest/

I got 27

used NovaPuch, FASA, Crew Manifest

Javascript is disabled. View full album
